scripts.test:functional: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=functional codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --grep '(?=.*)^(?!.*(@smoke-tests|@flaky|@nightlyOnly))' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:functional-nightly: yarn playwright install chromium && yarn playwright install firefox && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright test --project=chromium --project=webkit --project=firefox
scripts.test:functional-Edge: yarn playwright install msedge && yarn playwright test --project=edge
scripts.test:functional-chromium: yarn playwright install chrome  && yarn playwright test  --project=chrome
scripts.test:functional-webkit: yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright test  --project=webkit
scripts.test:functional-firefox: yarn playwright install firefox  && yarn playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:functional-ipadPro11: yarn playwright install webkit  && yarn playwright test --project=iPadPro11
scripts.test:functional-galaxyS4: yarn playwright install chromium  && yarn playwright test --project=GalaxyS4
scripts.test:functional-nightly-preview: yarn playwright install firefox && yarn playwright test --project=preview
scripts.test:smoke: yarn npm audit --recursive --environment production && MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=smoke REPORT_DIR=test-results/smokeTest REPORT_FILE=test-results/smokeTest/results.xml codeceptjs run --grep '@smoke-tests' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
